text: Does anyone have any tips for how to get my header and footer from my Wordpress website (made with Elementor, <http://www.recphilly.com|www.recphilly.com>) imported over to HubSpot? HubSpot imported our theme back in August but it has changed since then. I have manipulated the theme the way it was to try to get it to match, but I think to get it exact that there might be an easier way. Any suggestions (besides hiring a migration specialist)?
We have our main page on WP and our blog and LP's on Hub, but this only needs to be fixed for the blog listing page and post pages

purpose:

text:
set the channel description: Give us your feedback on the Design Manger
Design Manager UI Overview
<https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/developer-reference/design-manager>
Hey Brennen.  At a quick glance, It looks like you would just need a few hours worth of styling work from a developer to get the styles to match exactly

Yeah, you need to adjust some of the template as well as some of the css. I'm guessing 5-10 hours for something like that without really looking into it. I have time available next week if you are looking for someone to work on that for you.
